p: Fresh kuromoji leaves and branches were collected in June 2018 in the mountains near Hirakawa City, Japan. These samples were heated for 2 h to boiling point (100 Â°C). The hydro-distilled volatile component was subsequently collected and separated (upper layer: oil) from the aqueous portion (hydrosol). The kuromoji essential oil and hydrosol were purchased from Kojo Technology Co., Ltd. (Aomori, Japan).
